body_html: @girving I am trying to get this into the Eigen library but the mailing list/issue tracker seem very inactive and I think that getting it into Eigen is going to take a long time. Is there some way I could implement this within tensorflow?

body: @girving I am trying to get this into the Eigen library but the mailing list/issue tracker seem very inactive and I think that getting it into Eigen is going to take a long time. Is there some way I could implement this within tensorflow?
